testsuite.name: com.auction.verifications.Index
testsuite.system-out:
Step :: Enter admin username :: admin

Step :: Enter admin password :: 123123

Step :: Click on login button.

Normal

Step :: Click on settings tab.

Step :: Click on manage system parameters.

Step :: Click on user options link.

Normal

Step :: Maximize the registration settings.

Normal

Step :: Check simplified signup page checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck include basic info checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck make basic info mandatory checkbox.

Step :: Check include billing address info checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck make billing address info mandatory checkbox.

Step :: Check include cc info checkbox.

Step :: Check make cc info mandatory checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck include ach info checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck make ach info mandatory checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck verify email upon account registration checkbox.

Step :: Uncheck enable reseller registration checkbox.

Step :: Check required credit card on signup checkbox.

Step :: Enter on amount value.

Step :: Enter expires value.

Step :: Click on save changes button.

Step :: Click on logout button.

Step :: Go to front end.

Installation URL >> https://bid:path@qa-dev-auto.auctionserver.net/

Step :: Click on signup link.

Step :: Enter username.

Step :: Enter password.

Step :: Enter confirm password.

Step :: Enter first name.

Step :: Enter last name.

Step :: Enter email.

Step :: Enter phone number.

Step :: Select phone type.

Normal

Normal

Step :: Select identification type.

Normal

Step :: Entering captcha.

Step :: Selecting terms checkbox(confirmation).

Step :: Click on signup button.

Normal

Step :: Expiration CC has a BUG.

Step :: Signup not successful.Expired CC error message is displayed in red next to the CC expiration date field.
